project.projtitle: Knowledge Management Systems for Advanced e-Business Applications: Technological Capabilities, Opportunities and Prospects

description.p: Working Group IB2 explores and presents the capabilities of Knowledge Management Systems for modern organizations. The main objective is to inform private and public organizations about the capabilities and the advantages of Knowledge Management technologies and their impact on an organization’s innovation and competitiveness areas.
